kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.widget.TextView[@text='Dismiss'] xpath criteria: //android.widget.TextView[@text='Dismiss'] xpath criteria: //android.widget.TextView[@text='Dismiss'] xpath criteria: //android.widget.TextView[@text='Dismiss'] xpath criteria: //android.widget.TextView[@text='Dismiss']

kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.
kw.msg: Typing text 'hello123@gmail.com' into text field 'xpath=//android.widget.EditText[@text='Enter an e-mail address or username']'
xpath criteria: //android.widget.EditText[@text='Enter an e-mail address or username']

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.widget.TextView[@text='There was an issue signing in'] xpath criteria: //android.widget.TextView[@text='There was an issue signing in'] xpath criteria: //android.widget.TextView[@text='There was an issue signing in']

kw.name: Element Should Contain Text
kw.arg: There was an issue signing in
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//android.widget.TextView[@text='There was an issue signing in']' contains text 'There was an issue signing in'.
xpath criteria: //android.widget.TextView[@text='There was an issue signing in']

kw.name: Get Source
kw.doc: Returns the entire source of the current page.
kw.msg: ${page_source} = <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8' standalone='yes' ?> <hierarchy index="0" class="hierarchy" rotation="0" width="1080" height="2141"> <android.widget.FrameLayout index="0" package="org.khanacad...

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.
